summary.span: Provides a common implementation of members for the and classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供的常見項目實作和控制項。The class provides implementations of common elements for the and controls. 下列屬性是資料繫結的使用者主要關切的或: ， ， ，和屬性。The following properties are of primary concern to users of a data-bound or : , , , and properties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式會顯示如何使用， ， ，和成員類別由實作類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中時，選取的值用來傳回選取的項目相關聯的資料。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩種方式來填滿和控制項。There are two ways to fill the and controls. 例如，您可以將物件加入至使用方法。For example, you can add objects to the by using the method. 您也可以加入物件至使用， ，和屬性，以填滿。You can also add objects to a by using the , , and properties to fill the . 當屬性設定，使用者無法修改項目集合。When the property is set, a user cannot modify the items collection. 如果設定屬性造成變更，資料來源就會引發事件。If setting the property causes the data source to change, the event is raised. 如果設定這個屬性會導致資料成員，若要變更，就會引發事件。If setting this property causes the data member to change, the event is raised. 當您將至`null`，設為空字串 ("")。When you set to `null`, is set to an empty string (""). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式會顯示如何使用， ， ，和成員類別由實作類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中時，選取的值用來傳回選取的項目相關聯的資料。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ListControl1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#142](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#142)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#142](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#142)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從繼承的控制項可以顯示不同類型的物件。The controls that inherit from can display diverse types of objects. 如果指定的屬性不存在於物件或值的為空字串 ("")，此物件的結果`ToString`方法會改為顯示。If the specified property does not exist on the object or the value of is an empty string (""), the results of the object's `ToString` method are displayed instead. 如果無法設定新的顯示成員，會維護先前設定的顯示成員。If the new display member cannot be set, the previous display member setting is maintained. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式會顯示如何使用， ， ，和成員類別由實作類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中時，選取的值用來傳回選取的項目相關聯的資料。When the user selects an item in the list box, the selected value is used to return the data associated with the selected item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 中每個可見項目之前引發事件格式化。The event is raised before each visible item in the is formatted. 處理此事件可讓您存取此清單項目，顯示透過字串屬性。Handling this event gives you access to the string to be displayed for this list item, through the property of the . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ListControl1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 所使用的格式字串必須遵循標準[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]格式規格。The format string used must follow standard [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] format specifications. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化.NET Framework 中的型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information, see [Formatting Types in the .NET Framework](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether formatting is applied to the property of the .

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether formatting is applied to the property of the .

value.span: 如果格式設定的屬性已啟用，否則。

span.span: if formatting of the property is enabled; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性`true`導致事件来引發的每個可見成員。Setting the property to `true` causes the event to be raised for each visible member of the . ，和相關，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果是`false`，將不會設定為-1是空白的。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果是`true`，會設定為-1是空白的。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: A zero-based index of the currently selected item.

value.span: 如果未選取任何項目，將傳回負一 (-1)。

span.span: A value of negative one (-1) is returned if no item is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在不指定屬性，傳回的結果`ToString`物件的方法。If a property is not specified in , returns the results of the `ToString` method of the object. ，和相關，如下所示：, , and are related as follows: - 如果是`false`，將不會設定為-1是空白的。If is `false`, will not be set to -1 when is blank. - 如果是`true`，會設定為-1是空白的。If is `true`, will be set to -1 when is blank. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範傳回所指定之屬性的值屬性。The following code example shows the returning the value of the property specified by the property. 此程式碼是摘錄自中顯示的範例類別概觀。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 請參閱整個程式碼清單。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[ListControl#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例是完整的應用程式會顯示如何使用， ， ，和成員類別由實作類別。The following code example is a complete application that shows how you can use , , , and members of the class as implemented by the class. 此範例載入和清單方塊。The example loads an and the list box. 此範例也會使用填入文字方塊中，當使用者選取項目在清單方塊中的事件。The example also uses the event to fill in a text box when the user selects an item in the list box. 在文字方塊中填滿選取的項目相關聯的資料。The text box is filled with the data associated with the selected item. [!code-cpp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#1)]

value.span: A代表單一屬性名稱的屬性值或句號分隔的屬性名稱的解析成最終的資料繫結物件的屬性名稱的階層。

span.span: A representing a single property name of the property value, or a hierarchy of period-delimited property names that resolves to a property name of the final data-bound object.
The default is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定的內容萬一您資料繫結的屬性。Specify the contents of the property in cases where you bind data. 您可以清除屬性，方法是將屬性設定為空字串 ("") 或`null`。You can clear the property by setting the property to an empty string ("") or `null`. 設定新屬性引發和事件。Setting a new property raises the and events. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範資料載入到和設定清單中物件的屬性。The following code example shows loading the data into an and setting the to a property of the object in the list. [!code-cpp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListControl/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b6f65241-e0ad-4590-a99f-200ce741bb1f). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含繼承自類型的執行個體的專案，例如或。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of a type that inherits from , such as a or . 然後將其命名執行個體`ListControl1`，並確認事件處理常式關聯事件。Then name the instance `ListControl1` and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#148)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#148](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#148)]
